00107 #define ZCL_DEFINE_SCENES_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES() \
00108     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(sceneCount, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_SCENE_COUNT_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00109     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(currentScene, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_CURRENT_SCENE_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U8BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00110     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(currentGroup, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_CURRENT_GROUP_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID, 0x0000, 0xFFF7), \
00111     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(sceneValid, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_SCENE_VALID_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_BOOLEAN_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00112     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(nameSupport, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_NAME_SUPPORT_SERVER_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_8BIT_BITMAP_DATA_TYPE_ID), \
00113     DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(clusterVersion, ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE, ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID, ZCL_U16BIT_DATA_TYPE_ID)

00176 #define SCENES_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00177 { \
00178    .id = SCENES_CLUSTER_ID, \
00179    .options = { \
00180                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00181                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00182               }, \
00183    .attributesAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBTUES_AMOUNT, \
00184    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00185    .commandsAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00186    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00187 }
00188 
00189 #define SCENES_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00190 { \
00191    .id = SCENES_CLUSTER_ID, \
00192    .options = { \
00193                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00194                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00195               }, \
00196    .attributesAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00197    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00198    .commandsAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00199    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00200 }
00201 
00202 #define DEFINE_SCENES_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00203     SCENES_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00204 
00205 #define SCENES_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00206 { \
00207    .id = SCENES_CLUSTER_ID, \
00208    .options = { \
00209                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00210                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00211               }, \
00212    .attributesAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBTUES_AMOUNT, \
00213    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00214    .commandsAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00215    .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00216 }
00217 
00218 #define SCENES_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands) \
00219 { \
00220    .id = SCENES_CLUSTER_ID, \
00221    .options = { \
00222                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00223                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00224               }, \
00225    .attributesAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00226    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00227    .commandsAmount = ZCL_SCENES_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00228    .commands = (FLASH_PTR uint8_t *)clcommands \
00229 }

00231 #define DEFINE_SCENES_CLUSTER_FLASH(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00232     SCENES_CLUSTER_##cltype##_FLASH(clattributes, clcommands)

00242 typedef struct PACK
00243 {
00244   uint16_t groupId;
00245   uint8_t sceneId;
00246   uint16_t transitionTime;
00247   uint8_t name[1];
00248 } ZCL_AddScene_t;

00256   uint16_t groupId;
00257   uint8_t sceneId;
00258 } ZCL_ViewScene_t;

00276   uint16_t groupId;
00277 } ZCL_RemoveAllScenes_t;

00381 typedef struct PACK
00382 {
00383   struct PACK
00384   {
00385     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00386     uint8_t type;
00387     uint8_t properties;
00388     uint8_t value;
00389   } sceneCount;
00390 
00391   struct PACK
00392   {
00393     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00394     uint8_t type;
00395     uint8_t properties;
00396     uint8_t value;
00397   } currentScene;
00398 
00399   struct PACK
00400   {
00401     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00402     uint8_t type;
00403     uint8_t properties;
00404     uint16_t value;
00405     uint16_t minVal;
00406     uint16_t maxVal;
00407   } currentGroup;
00408 
00409   struct PACK
00410   {
00411     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00412     uint8_t type;
00413     uint8_t properties;
00414     bool value;
00415   } sceneValid;
00416 
00417   struct PACK
00418   {
00419     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00420     uint8_t type;
00421     uint8_t properties;
00422     uint8_t value;
00423   } nameSupport;
00424   
00425   struct PACK
00426   {    
00427     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00428     uint8_t type;
00429     uint8_t properties;
00430     uint16_t value;        
00431   } clusterVersion;
00432   
00433 } ZCL_SceneClusterServerAttributes_t;
00434 
00439 typedef struct PACK
00440 {
00441   struct PACK
00442   {    
00443     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;

00445     uint8_t properties;
00446     uint16_t value;        
00447   } clusterVersion;
00448   
00449 } ZCL_SceneClusterClientAttributes_t;
